occurrences.snippet: try { Bus.emit('game:ws:send', { type: 'demo_reset', payload: { sessionId, game: gameSlug } }); } catch {}
const wsSend  = (type, payload = {}) => Bus.emit('game:ws:send', { type, payload });
Bus.on('game/reset',              () => document.body.classList.remove('is-preplay'));  // sécurité globale (si tu as cet event)
Bus.on('onAfterNextSelected',     () => document.body.classList.remove('is-preplay'));  // sécurité au changement de question
// Bus.emit('player/bingo:winner', { name: m?.winner_name ?? null, grid_number: m?.grid_number ?? null, prize_label: m?.prize_label ?? null, won_phase: m?.won_phase ?? null });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Aucun identifiant joueur — veuillez vous inscrire.' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Aucun identifiant joueur — veuillez vous inscrire.' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Session différente — veuillez vous réinscrire.' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Auth bingo papier incomplète (player_id manquant).' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Auth bingo papier incomplète (player_id manquant).' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Grille introuvable — merci de recharger ou de récupérer une grille.' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Auth bingo incomplète (player_id, id_grid ou token).' });
Bus.emit('player/error', { message: 'Identifiant joueur introuvable. Inscris-toi d’abord.' });
Bus.emit('player/options:hold', { options: m.options }); // on les garde côté UI
Bus.on('player/paper:listen', async ({ sessionId: sid, playerId, playerName, gridId } = {}) => {
try { GameStore.set('status.playerReady', true); Bus.emit('player/ready', { source: 'support-prepared' }); } catch {}
try { GameStore.set('status.playerReady', true); Bus.emit('player/ready', { source: 'support-started' }); } catch {}
Bus.emit('player/running:update', { theme: '', indexLabel: '#1/?', phaseLabel: info.name, titleQZ: '', index1based: 1 });
Bus.emit('prizes/updated',   { prizes: session.prizes, mainTitle: session.mainTitle, token });
Bus.on('q/set',          ({ index, total }) => { renderQuestionIndex(index, total); updateNextDisabled(); });
Bus.emit('quiz/interseries/end'); // le player stoppera la pause et relancera
Bus.on('quiz/interseries/start', ({ lotId, lotName, lotOrder, duration, manual }) => {
Bus.on('remote/bingo:winner', ({ id, name, prize_label, won_phase, grid_number }) => {
['songStuck', () => Bus.emit('remote/error', { message: 'Le player principal a signalé un blocage.' })],
['gameStateError', (m) => Bus.emit('remote/error', { message: m?.message || 'Erreur état de jeu' })],
if (now) Bus.emit('remote/now', { item: now, label: labelFor(now, g) });
try { Bus.emit('remote/playlist:snapshot', { items: playlist.items, total: playlist.total, game: g }); } catch {}
Bus.emit('remote/state', { game_status, paperAwaitingFinal: awaiting, remainingTime: pickRemaining(m), current_phase: currentPhase });
Bus.emit('remote/state', { game_status: gs, paperAwaitingFinal: awaiting, remainingTime: pickRemaining(m), current_phase: currentPhase });
Bus.emit('remote/state', { game_status, remainingTime: pickRemaining(m), current_phase: Number(m.current_phase) });
if (next != -1) Bus.emit('remote/state', { game_status: info.game_status, current_phase: next });
Bus.emit('remote/state', { game_status: playing ? 'En cours' : 'Pause', remainingTime: pickRemaining(m), current_phase: currentPhase });
Bus.emit('remote/upcoming', { items: sliced, labels, start, numbers, total });
Bus.emit('srv/notifications', { items: { log_type: LOG.LocalMilestone, message: FIRST_SONG_LINES[2], ts: now     }});
Bus.emit('srv/notifications', { items: { log_type: LOG.LocalMilestone, message: FIRST_SONG_LINES[1], ts: now + 1 }});
Bus.emit('srv/notifications', { items: { log_type: LOG.LocalMilestone, message: FIRST_SONG_LINES[0], ts: now + 2 }});
Bus.emit('srv/notifications', { items: { log_type: LOG.LocalMilestone, message: MONEY_TIME_LINE, ts: Date.now() }});
Bus.emit('srv/notifications', { items: { log_type: LOG.LocalFun, message: pickNonRepeating(bag), ts: Date.now() }});
setTimeout(() => Bus.emit('support/overlays/hide', { delay: 0 }), 3000); // puis cache après 3s
try { Bus.emit('support/preplay/started', { token: currentSupportToken, source: 'yt-resume' }); } catch {}
try { Bus.emit('support/preplay/started', { token: supportToken, source: 'yt' }); } catch {}
try { Bus.emit('support/preplay/started', { token: supportToken, source: 'yt' }); } catch {}
try { Bus.emit('support/started', { token: null, reason: 'yt-after-jingle' }); } catch {}
Bus.emit('timer/end'); // passage à la question suivante
Bus.emit('timer/transition', { progress: p }); // 0 au début, 1 à la fin
Bus.on('ws/close', () => bannerWarn('Déconnecté — tentative de reconnexion...', { ttl: 3000 }));
Bus.emit('ws/registered', { ack: { ok: true, meta: data } });
const off = Bus.on('ws/registered', (a) => { try { off(); } catch {} resolve(a?.ack || a); });
